name: Monopoly Spongebob Squarepants Edition
summary: Monopoly: SpongeBob SquarePants Edition moves onto your computer with more ways to play than just rolling a pair of dice! Experience the classic board game you know and love like never before! Play by Monopoly rules or bend the rules with SpongeBob mode, Squidward mode or Plankton mode...all chock full of wacky water-logged minigames!
info:
• 中文名: 海绵宝宝大富翁
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Mac

  • 发行日期: 2007年10月19日
